General.Name: Ivrnet Inc
General.Description: Ivrnet Inc., a software and communications company, develops, hosts, sells, and supports value added business automation software solutions in Canada and the United States. Its applications facilitate automated interaction through personalized communication between people; mass communication for disseminating information to thousands of people concurrently; and personalized communication between people and automated systems. The company also provides IT services and software development services, as well as sells equipment; communication services, such as telephone, fax, toll, audio conference, and invoicing services; texting and text advertising services; business services comprising website, server, community management, and registration system hosting; and payment card industry services. In addition, it engages in the provision of software-related services, including training, installation, consulting, and maintenance. Ivrnet Inc. was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Calgary, Canada
General.Address: 1400, 350 ? 7th Avenue S.W., Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 3N9
